description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.00m and eaves height of 3.00m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) and no objections have been received.

Condition 11 (nature conservation) of permission 23/02094/FUL states:The development to which this permission relates shall not be commenced until a scheme toenhance the nature conservation interest of the site has been submitted to and agreed in writing by the local planning authority. The approved scheme shall be implemented in full prior to beneficial occupation of the development.Reason: To safeguard the biodiversity and nature conservation value of the site, in accordance with policy G6 of the London Plan 2021 and policies CS3 and DM6 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.The scheme is required before development commences because it would affect the design of subsequent elements of the development.Officer Comment: The proposal relates to the approved application ref 23/02094/FUL for 'Erection of first floor extension to create 2nos. self-contained apartments, with access, bin and cycle storage and associated alterations'.The applicant has submitted a covering letter and the drawing 2268/DOC/09 showing provision of a green roof planted with Bauder Flora 5 Seed Mix, a mix of species intended for city environments able to absorb pollution and CO2 and creating a suitable environment for insects and invertebrates.It is noted that 6 bee bricks would be provided within the south facing elevation. As such it is considered that the submitted information is acceptable and the provided details relating to Condition 11 (nature conservation) are hereby approved.

We have received the proof of disability for Mrs Zoubeida Beedee Salim, please show the relation with the applicant Mr Mohamed Salim  and please confirm she lives in the proposed site.Otherwise the fee required for your planning application is Â£ 258.00.  Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website or our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002.
